name: Dreaming anxiety
description:
Dreaming anxiety:

A game made in ISO C99, OpenGL and OpenAL.

-------------------------------------------

The game follows the story of a young Irish lad who worries about how he will 
perform during the great leprechaun hunting contest coming up the following day. 
His performance is greatly influenced by how much sleep he gets during the night 
prior. It is your duty to ensure that our poor young lad does not have his sweet 
dreams deprived of the underlying fears that his mind harbors.

-------------------------------------------

Credits:
William Burwall: Art, Music
Mido Kalash: C
Anton Näslund: Sound effects
Philip Rosberg (StubbyRogue46): C, OpenGL, OpenAL

-------------------------------------------

System requirements:
Operating system: Windows 7 or later.
Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 or later.
Audio: Should exist and be turned on.
Other hardware: A "toaster" should do.
